participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and compassionate, with a nurturing spirit.
participant_1.background: I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets. I am studying to be a special education teacher. I am from Georgia. I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin. I like to make clothes.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and friendly, with a passion for teaching and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: My pets are always excited to see me when I come home from work, even if I've only been gone for a few hours. I broke my nose in 5th grade. I miss my parents a lot. I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair. I decided to become vegan a year ago.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking.  How about you?
I'm doing well too! I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets.  How about you, do you have any pets?
I do! I have a dog and a cat. They're both really sweet and they always make me happy when I come home from work.
That's great! I love animals.  I'm from Georgia, but I've been living in rural Wisconsin for a while now.  I love the cold weather here, but I do miss my parents a lot.
I'm from Michigan, so I'm used to the cold weather.  I've always wanted to visit Georgia, though!  What do you do for fun?
I like to make clothes and I'm studying to be a special education teacher.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sew.  I'm a teacher too, but I teach kindergarten.
That's awesome! I bet it's a lot of fun to teach kindergarten.  What's your favorite part of the job?
My favorite part is seeing the kids learn and grow.  They're so excited to learn new things and it's really rewarding to see them progress.
